verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5324>stands<s%> in the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H410>mighty;<s%> he <S%H8199>judges<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H430>gods.<s%>
<S%H5704>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H5766>unjustly,<s%> and <S%H5375>accept<s%> the <S%H6440>persons<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked?<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H8199>Defend<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> and <S%H3490>fatherless:<s%> do <S%H6663>justice<s%> to the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and <S%H7326>needy.<s%>
<S%H6403>Deliver<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy:<s%> <S%H5337>rid<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

They <S%H3045>know<s%> not, <S%H3808>neither<s%> will they <S%H995>understand;<s%> they <S%H1980>walk<s%> on in <S%H2825>darkness:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> are out of <S%H4131>course.<s%>
I have <S%H559>said,<s%> You are <S%H430>gods;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> of you are <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H5945>most<s%> <S%H5945>High.<s%>
But you shall <S%H4191>die<s%> like <S%H120>men,<s%> and <S%H5307>fall<s%> like <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes.<s%>
